title: Weird But True, 200 Astounding, Outrageous, and Totally Off the Wall Facts
description: True or False?  Tamarin monkeys dig the heavy metal sound of the band Metallica   If an axolotl salamander loses a leg, it will grow a new one in about three weeks   Peach pits, apricot pits, and apple seeds contain the poison cyanide   A mosquito's "nose" is located on its antennae   The moon is moving away from the Earth at a rate of about 1.5 inches each year   About one in every 863 patients under general anethesia has some awareness or recollection of their surgical procedure   Each of us carries about 150 species of bacteria on our hands  Weird... but true!
author: Leslie Gilbert Elman
